title: Important features of music streaming services in the U.S. 2018
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories for the x axis representing Response, and a y axis representing Share of respondents.
The highest category is found at The_variety_of_music_available where Share of respondents is 81.0.
The lowest category is found at Artist_exclusives where Share of respondents is 46.0.

data.Response: The ability to listen on multiple divices
Good algorithms to find new music
The ability to combine your music library with your streaming service library
The ability to stream on smart home devices
